Fragrance notes and description

Angels' Share by By Kilian is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Angels' Share was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Benoist Lapouza. Top note is Cognac; middle notes are Cinnamon, Tonka Bean and Oak; base notes are Praline, Vanilla and Sandalwood.
